definition: the name does not correspond to reality (idiom); it doesn't live up to its reputation
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
(negative prefix)/not/no
mark/sign/talisman/to seal/to correspond to/tally/symbol/written charm/to coincide
surname Fu
real/true/honest/really/solid/fruit/seed/definitely

sentences.english: He is unworthy of the title engineer.
sentences.chinese: 他是个名不符实的工程师。

sentences.english: The archives appeared the strange happening which is unworthy of the name until now.
sentences.chinese: 档案学发展至今出现了名不符实的怪现象。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, all that is a typical instance of un- deserved reputation.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这实在是名不符实的一个最大的例证。

sentences.english: Nowadays , some writers are not living up to their names.
sentences.chinese: 如今，有些作家名不符实。

definition: the name does not reflect the reality (idiom); more in name than in fact/Reality does not live up to the name./Excellent theory, but the practice does not bear it out.
with an undeserved reputation (idiom); unwarranted fame/nowhere near as good as he's made out to be
with an undeserved reputation (idiom); unwarranted fame/nowhere near as good as he's made out to be
to exaggerate/to overstate the facts
to fool the world and usurp a good name (idiom)
lit. to hang a sheep's head while selling dog meat (idiom)/fig. to cheat/dishonest advertising/wicked deeds carried out under banner of virtue
pinyin: gua4 yang2 tou2 mai4 gou3 rou4

definition: not more than so-so (idiom); mediocre/nothing out of the ordinary
looks impressive but is worthless (idiom)/not as good as it looks/a reputation with no substance
lit. to play the yu 竽 mouth organ to make up numbers (idiom); fig. to make up the numbers with inferior products/to masquerade as having an ability/token member of a group
lit. has a name but no reality (idiom); exists only in name/nominal
false reputation
to angle for fame (idiom)/to fish for compliments
name/good reputation/title
to only have
gilded exterior, shabby and ruined on the inside (idiom)
pinyin: jin1 yu4 qi2 wai4 , bai4 xu4 qi2 zhong1

definition: to label/to call
